abstract: Bronx man Prezidor Porbeni is arrested and charged in hit-and-run accident on New Year’s Eve in Manhattan that killed a 44-year-old woman Guler Ugur-Yaacobi.
lead_paragraph: Guler Ugur-Yaacobi, 44, was struck and killed by the man, Prezidor Porbeni, while she was crossing Amsterdam Avenue on West 113th Street in Manhattan.
snippet: Guler Ugur-Yaacobi, 44, was struck and killed by the man, Prezidor Porbeni, while she was crossing Amsterdam Avenue on West 113th Street in Manhattan.

headline.main: Bronx Man Surrenders and Is Charged in a Fatal Hit and Run
headline.print_headline: Bronx Man Surrenders and Is Charged in a Fatal Hit and Run
